origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EducationFinanceAPI.fetch_policy', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest financial support policies for a specified sector and year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial policy, e.g., financial_support, tax_relief.'}, {'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector the policy applies to, e.g., education, healthcare.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the policy is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy', 'description': 'The policy document or details.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EducationFinanceAPI.fetch_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'financial_support', 'sector'是'education', 'year'是'2023'.
